column1: | jean m. hench passed away on june 13
column5: after a long battle with cancer. she was born in wausau
column7: edmund hall and hilda (wilde) elfe. she graduated from marathon high school in 1964. jean married the love of her life perry hench at holy name catholic church
column9: in 1968. she worked for 30 years at federal mogul in wausau and retired with her husband in 2008. family was a priority for jean and she loved spending time with them. she was an attentive grandmother. jean also enjoyed camping
column15: and long walks. she wintered in texas and learned to love square dancing. she leaves behind her loving husband
column16: perry hench and her daughters kristine metz and sara hench
column17: as well as her three grandsons
column20: and carsen metz. jean is also survived by her mother
column28: and terry elfe; and numerous nieces and nephews. jean is preceded in death by her father
column29: edmund hall. the family would like to extend a special thank you to the aspirus hospice house staff for the excellent care they provided
column30: as well as buettgen funeral home for helping with the funeral arrangements. visitation will be held on wednesday
column32: 2015 from 4 p. m. to 8 p. m. with a prayer service at 7:30 p. m. at john j. buettgen funeral home. services will be held at st. therese catholic church on thursday
column34: 2015 at 11:00 a. m. with visitation one hour prior
column35: father louis britto officiating. on line condolences can be made at www. honor. one. com
